devMint(uint256).details: deployer can mint specific ammount of nft token without paying ps. or use mintAllowList directally

dropDeployer().details: transfer the ownership of the contract to null address

mintTicket(uint8).details: free mint successfully for the first time minter however, once one own the nft, should pay to mint more (free mint, >1 mint cost). ps: if wanna random mint can use chainlink
